## Base class

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/legalityresult">LegalityResult</a></>}>
The legality outcome is represented by a class rather than an enum class because in some cases the legality checks are expensive and look for a particular instruction that can be passed along to the vectorizer to avoid repeating the same expensive computation. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/legalityresult/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>
